data.subject: Sparkle & Shine
data.lyric:
Here we go
 
 I feel so alive ain't afraid of nothing
 The timing is right gettin' ready to roll
 Gr

data.subject: So Good (International Ver.)
data.lyric:
We know how to dare, we know how to dream
 Tonight is the night
 What we wanna be we'll be
 We're go
